name: BOY R GIV
description:
* Watch your step- The floor that's not the right color will harm you! Use the screen to know when it's going to switch!

* 6 levels to reach the goal with branching paths or speed-run!

*Save your high scores to compare runs with your friends!

*An entirely original OST and SFX inspired by the platformers of old!

*Sprawling backgrounds give a heightened sense of movement!
